comment: There was almost no way to contact her outside of class. Just read off slides. No study guides, no help. Stopped showing up near the end of the semester and as long as you read the 50+ slides she goes through and memorize the info. Only grades were ten weekly homework assignments and 4 tests. Would not recommend.
rating_tags: Lecture heavy--Test heavy--Graded by few things

comment: If you want a class that's strictly lectures with no engagement and little instruction, this is the class for you. There are typically 200+ slides per chapter and no clear guidelines on what to study for exams. Professor Ziegler hardly responds when reached out to as well. Do not recommend this class at all

DO NOT TAKE HER! Take anyone else! By default, KSU switched our assigned professor to her. She takes random attendance; she reads straight off of the powerpoints. There are 3 exams. 45-60 questions and 1 hour to complete. Each exam combines 4-5 chapters. Weekly discussion assignments, which are easy. Her exams are difficult though. No extra credit.

Professor Ziegler just reads the powerpoints on D2L, no point going to class. Exams are based on a couple hundred slides of powerpoints, questions are really specific, so get ready to memorize a lot. She is not helpful over email. She is a nice enough person, but doesn't put much effort into being a teacher. I'd recommend taking another Professor.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Graded by few things

comment: Avoid her. She's the most boring professor ever, I stopped showing up. She reads off unorganized powerpoints and goes on rants about whatever. Takes random attendance but I still didn't show up because shes that bad. Weekly assignments but super easy. Tests are pretty tough, however I still passed because I learned on my own.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lecture heavy--Test heavy

comment: Any other professor available would be a better option. I do not recommend, she does not care about how students are performing, professors should constantly be improving their teaching methods to actually teach something. Very unorganized and her tests are difficult despite spending so many hours studying.

She doesn’t curve her exam or give extra credit and there’s only three exams online webcam worth 75% of your grade. Hardest class I had. Everyone made a bad grade on her exam however one PSYCH major made a 100 and she said she wasn’t going to give a curve

Honestly there is so much I could say about this professor. My main problem is her teaching method, she goes through 100+ slides, reads through the slide and that's it. The test are extremely hard, I spent for much time studying and I would still not score well. She does not take feedback or care if students are performing bad. Avoid her!

My entire class unfortunately got switched to Ziegler by default. She lectures straight off her unorganized 90 slide ppts, and goes on weird rants about god knows what. I try to focus but she makes it really hard. Grades on weekly quick writing prompts and 3 exams. Her exams are on lockdown and pretty thorough. Take literally anyone else.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Accessible outside class

comment: There are very few grades with three tests making up a majority of your final grades. The tests are extremely hard. I usually find tests to be fairly easy, but had to devote hours everyday for week for each test in order to do well.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Test heavy--Tough grader

comment: All she does is read straight off the powerpoint, you might as well not even go to class. Three tests and a homework due every weekend. This class is basically self taught. She says as long as the class average is a C she's doing good. do not take this prof.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Graded by few things--Lecture heavy

comment: This professor is absolutely terrible. Her lectures consist of her reading off of PowerPoints that are 96 slides long. The tests are impossible to pass and are the main source of your grade. 10/10 do not recommend.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--Test heavy

comment: She is a pretty straightforward teacher, atleast at 8am. The first week or two she was so boring that I re thought if my major was what i wanted to do. She's fine now. Just go to class and take notes. she does use a lockdown browser but i mean what professor doesn't these days.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Graded by few things

comment: Class-wide issues were seen as a personal affront to her and never resolved. The assignments were easy, exams were doable - as long as you take notes during lectures. I was disappointed by the disrespectful way she spoke to students. Take someone else!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Lecture heavy

comment: Shes the most boring professor ive ever had. The lectures are not interesting at all cuz she literally just reads off a powerpoint smh also her study guide sucks, only a quarter of it be on the exam. PPT slides are 94 slides long per chpter!! Please don't take her. Shes horrible and didn't learn jack squat in this supposedly "easy class"
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Graded by few things--Lecture heavy

comment: THE WORST. She never got through an entire PPT so we were behind the entire semester. She told us that if we had a "C" average then we were doing ok which is fine to pass the class but it brings down your entire GPA. If you see her name for the course take it with another professor, if she's the only professor for the class change your major.

DO NOT TAKE HER. She leaves you guessing all semester about EVERYTHING. No communication, WILL NOT respect you when you ask a question in class /in private about anything. Will invalidate the class when they all collectively have issues. All she did was read from the book on collab, so get ready to teach yourself. Very unorganized & disrespectful.

She might be better in class, but she is terrible teaching online. She is very technically challenged, she has trouble posting assignments and other material that's needed and doesn't reply to emails. Not a hard class, but definitely impacted my grade for not accommodating the material for online

Don't take for online class. Super unorganized and does not respond to emails. Opens exam during class time (which sucks) and I asked her if she can push my exam back bc I felt like trash and she did without ever emailing me back. long story short i was confused already thinking I was going to take at normal time & asked to & failed so loved that
